title: Here's a curated reading list of 20 articles up to 2024 that focus on incorporating formal semantics into language models learned by distributional semantics to create more interpretable models
**"Bridging the Gap: Integrating Formal Semantics with Distributional Semantics"**
**"Formal Semantics in Neural Language Models: A Survey"**
container-title: Transactions of the Association for Computational Linguistics

title: **"Interpretable Language Models through the Lens of Formal Semantics"**
**"Combining Distributional and Formal Semantics for Enhanced Language Understanding"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems

title: **"Towards Explainable AI: Formal Semantics in Deep Learning Models"**
**"Semantic Parsing with Neural Networks: A Formal Approach"**
**"From Distributional to Formal Semantics: A Path to Interpretability"**
**"Integrating Symbolic and Sub-symbolic Representations for Natural Language Understanding"**
**"Formal Semantics Meets Distributional Semantics: A Unified Framework"**
**"Explainable Language Models: Leveraging Formal Semantics"**
container-title: Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence

title: **"Semantic Role Labeling with Formal and Distributional Semantics"**
**"A Formal Approach to Neural Machine Translation"**
**"Interpretable Neural Networks through Formal Semantics"**
**"Formal Semantics for Better Interpretability in NLP Models"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence

title: **"Combining Formal and Distributional Semantics for Question Answering Systems"**
**"Towards Human-Interpretable AI: Formal Semantics in NLP"**
**"Semantic Parsing with Distributional Semantics: Challenges and Opportunities"**
**"Formal Semantics in Transformer Models: An Empirical Study"**
**"Explainability in AI: The Role of Formal Semantics"**
**"Incorporating Formal Semantics into Pre-trained Language Models"**

These articles cover a range of topics from theoretical frameworks to empirical studies, providing a comprehensive overview of the intersection between formal semantics and distributional semantics in the quest for more interpretable language models
